metadata.summary: Deploy LimaCharlie sensors across many endpoints simultaneously using installation keys with RMM, SCCM, MDM, or cURL commands
metadata.primary_use_case: Deploy LimaCharlie agents across hundreds or thousands of endpoints in an enterprise environment
